content.detailedDescription: I was driving to visit in an area of my town i frequently go and once lived, i was driving and noticed a low bright light in the sky just above the mountain i thought to myself wow i have never seen that there before, it was too close and bright to be a star so i thought that maybe it was a satellite but i have never seen a satellite that close before. the object appeared to be hovering i stopped my car and got out and took some pictures and a short video. i took pictures on my phone some with the zoom and some without as well i took a couple pictures with the flash some without, but i am not sure which are which. when taking the pictures the object was bopping around in and out of the frame, i thought it might be me but then i steadied my arm on my car and the same thing was happening. then my cell phone died, so i left and the object was still there, i returned to the same spot about an hour and a half later and it was gone. when i got home i plugged in my cell phone and it was showing 40%
content.summary: Saw something on a regular route, normally not there

content.detailedDescription: Contact me
content.summary: Photos

content.detailedDescription:
What i posted on local facebook pages:
did anyone hear or see objects in the sky crossing east to west over point mtn last night from 9:05-9:20 ??....Friend saw a fleet of 20 objects flying in a very loose formation e/w. blinking lights on each - white, red and green, in a square shape...No sound, but a pulsating vibrating sensation....Made him uneasy and he went inside...Then he checked to see if they were gone and there were 10 coming n/s underneath the 20 travelling e/w. silent....Now recalls perhaps a flash...Or two - all identical. the sky was covered with them making a grid. i felt uneasy.
content.summary: ?? - did anyone hear or see objects in the sky crossing east to west over point mtn last night from 9:05-9:20 ??....Friend saw a fleet of 20 objects flying in a very loose formation e/w. blinking lights on each - white, red and green, in a square shape...

content.detailedDescription:
Friday ��� november 15, 2013 at about 2-3 a.M.

i was driving west on i-90 at 75 mph somewhere west of mitchell, sd.  the sky was clear and the moon almost full.  about a mile ahead off to the right, i spotted 3 radio towers and began scrutinizing them waiting for the flashing red light required to alert small aircraft of their presence.  after a few seconds (5 or less) i noticed a sudden bright yellowish light strobe on and off quickly (1/10 of a second duration or less; probably hundredths of a second).  i quickly realized that it was not directly on top of the towers, but closer to me than were the towers.

i wondered why i didn't see a red pulsating light, but rather this strobing topaz light.  about 3 seconds after the first "flash", it strobed again but was much closer, moving almost exactly opposite the direction i was travelling, but slightly angled towards the highway.  

about 3 seconds later, it flashed again.  i very briefly looked at the highway to ensure i was pointed well in my lane then looked directly to my right through the passenger window of the full-size pick-up truck i was driving hoping that i would see it one more time before i passed it.  

it flashed one more time with a light of incredibly intensity with "crystals" of brilliant light that was gem-like; like topaz in color and luminosity on the bottom.  the light on the top was also of a crystalline structure and brilliance, but was pure white.  the white light was only the upper portion of the object and the "crystals" were shorter than the topaz ones that constituted most of the light phenomenon.  

the structure was only observed as an emanation of light.  it was not symmetric vertically, but appeared to have most of its mass on the bottom or larger half in a vertical sense.  the upper part that was white did not extend to the front or back of the largest horizontal dimension; the direction of travel.  it was only this last (4th) flash where it appeared closest to me that i could see that there were two different colors of light.  there was no sound then or a sound wake that followed.  based on the distance travelled in the space of time required, it must have been travelling at least 150-300 mph if not a little more.

it wasn't until after the last flash that i did the "math" in my head and realized that a small plane would have displayed a red light at the tip of the port wing and a green at the tip of the opposite/starboard wing.  i lived less than a mile from a major airport for several years and observed many small aircraft and helicopters approach and depart at a close distance.  

the phenomenon being reported here was unlike anything i've ever seen, heard described, or have seen in pictures, videos, or depicted in drawings.  in just these immediate few seconds that followed the last flash, i realized that this was not something i know to be man-made; hence this report.
content.summary: Observed strobing light that appeared yellow-orange/topaz in color then saw that it was also white on top when directly opposite me while driving west on i-90

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were visiting her family members in az., and it was a beautiful evening (temperature about 75 degrees, at about 7:30 pm). we were on vacation from the 19th until the 27th of october (2013). i believe my estimation of the date of the photo is very close. my girlfriend's mom has a pretty nice backyard, and there is a gorgeous giant cactus just over her brick wall. the moon was out--and just about (if not completely) full. it was just a very nice scene and i have a 'photographer's eye' so i decided to snap a shot with our fuji 12.2 megapixel digital camera. i did not notice the object in the upper right hand of the frame until the next day. i initially believed it was just dust on the view screen, and tried wiping it off. it did not wipe off. i then utilized the 'zoom' feature on the camera and enlarged the spot on the frame where the object was. i became disturbed because it was not an airplane-it is obviously 'disc shaped', and looks as large or larger than a jet plane. no wings, or fuselage, or lights are visible at all. i actually took a photo of a jet plane the next night under very similar conditions and the difference is obvious. when i got back to jersey, i enlarged the shot as much as i could on my pc. i searched on the web for someone to send this picture to so it could be studied or verified. i found you guys and remembered hearing about mufon on a television show once. i hope this helps or interests you.
content.summary: I did not notice the object until after the photo was taken. i was taking a photo (of a beautiful cactus and the moon was out before it was dark)-noticed object next day.

content.detailedDescription: One night we were looking arcoss the street and there were v shape that had lights that were blinding and we couldnt see it due the lights and it just disapper into thin air
content.summary: Black light shine dissapper

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a picture of the weird sun this morning.  it looked like there was 3 suns from the cold i guess.  anyways i took a few shots with my phone and after looking at all three i noticed this object in each picture.  the last shot looks like a creepy eyeball...  

i have full size images saved.  i want to know what this is!
content.summary: I was taking a picture of the weird sun this morning.  it looked like there was 3 suns from the cold i guess.  anyways i took a few shots with my phone and after looking at all three i noticed this object.

content.detailedDescription: Researchers chuck wade and art campbell have recovered metal fragments from the plains of san agustin site long thought to possibly have been the locale of a ufo crash around 1947.  preliminary analysis of these fragments suggests a possible anomalous nature of the metal, but multiple testing is needed to corroborate/clarify this.
content.summary: Metal fragments found at site need further lab testing to determine whether isotope ratios indicate extraterrestrial origin.

content.detailedDescription: While checking out the boats for sale section in the minneapolis section of craigslist on 12-5-2013, i noticed a strange looking object in the sky in the background of a boat photo. the ad said it was posted 11 days ago, so this boat photo was probably taken by the boat owner on or about nov. 24, 2013 in brooklyn park, minnesota. i've attached 3 pics, one is original size from the craigslist posting, the next is zoomed in 400 percent, the last is zoomed in 1000 percent. the object appears to be dark in color, square shaped, with two appendages protruding from the top, the left appendage skinny and the right appendage fatter. the object appears to have an accompanying square shaped fog? exhaust? force field? misty halo? surrounding it.
content.summary: Dark square shaped object in clear blue daytime sky

content.detailedDescription: First of all i'd like to say that i've been observing these objects from the age of eight i am now sixty-four and can see them still today most knights in fact, i call them the observers i've seen them move between the stars not in a strait line they are the same size as stars never thought much about it their just watching us. then one night my sister and i were driving to new brunswick and i told her about the lights that i keep seeing in the sky by the way this was twenty years ago and told her when i spot one i'll show her well no surprise to me i spot six of them very close together four of them were in a strait line horizontally the other two were located to the left in a vertical position, the top one on the left started moving down and under the four horizontal ones in a squiggly manner my sister said it looked like righting motion it went to the end of the four in line then returned to it's original position then the other one on the left did the same thing as the first one my sister was flabbergasted,as for me i was excited it was proof that they were not satellites or aeroplanes. after seeing all of this we got in the car and drove off never looking up so what they did after i don't know, we are definitely being watched with good intentions i hope ,i swear the above is strait and true happy to share ray.This all happened approximately twenty years ago.
content.summary: Six seen in sky moving in a strang way

content.detailedDescription:
As a student pilot in late 2001, i was flying the pattern at ledgedale airpark while my cfi (instructor) was on the ground observing. while half way on the downwind leg at pattern elevation (1,000 ft agl), i noticed a small grey round object at my 12:00 o'clock that was keeping pace with my piper at about 50 yards away. i veered slightly to the right to avoid any contact, but in a matter of moments the object closed the distance and was within 20 feet at my 10 o'clock and again keeping pace with my 90 knots airspeed for about 20 to 30 seconds. 

following the encounter at close range, the object was no longer in sight. im not sure what direction it departed as i was too busy being nervous and trying to fly the airplane. i was a bit shaken and decided it would be wise to land as soon as possible. after landing and shutting down the airplane, i immediately approached my instructor and asked if he had witnessed the object and his reply was, "no".

at first sight i was thinking it was a helium balloon, but when witnessed at 20 feet i knew it was anything but a balloon. it was dull grey metallic in appearance and had a texture to it that is difficult to describe. during the days that followed i have shared my story with a few friends and had asked the question, "can ufos be small and round? at the time of the incident i was not a sky watcher and had little knowledge of ufo encounters except to say that the comic book saucer-shaped ships are all that i knew. after much research and hundreds of other similar witnesses that have come to light in recent years i thought it was time to share my story.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: Viewed a spere at close range while piloting a piper aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
Me and brother were on cello wallace 8405 church ranch blvd.
westminster, co 80021 back in 2007 it wasnt a cloundy night but before we saw a black helicopter about 23 min later w saw the triangle it had blue and red beam the it transmorm into three then after 26 mins it took off and 
i dont know its felt like i was hypostitis later on we came we saw it againn after that i never seen it again
content.summary: Crazy triangle mind blowing

content.detailedDescription: Our sightings were captured in night camera photographing deer feeders. my husband was unbelieving of the cotulla, tx. sightings until he saw the objects in the sky in the night camera over our ranch, approx 35 miles from cotulla. photos spanned from oct. 25 to nov 1, 2013. sighted at least 5 different shapes, all at night with lights glowing. there are 2 daytime sightings, one being a disc, the other being a muffin shaped. these were all in the sky and not lights from a land vehicle. we are located in the eagle ford shale oilfields.
content.summary: Pictures in night camera appearing within 8 days of each other.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was standing at the corner of felton fair shopping center at the front of the closest store to mt. hermon road looking west towards highway 9 with the bonnydoon mountain behind. i saw what possibly appeared to be a plane slowly moving north a little bit above bonnydoon mountain from my angle. object was about 3/4-1.5 miles away aprox. what caught my eye is when it stopped for a few second then moved south then to the north a few times as it descended slightly sometimes hovering for a few seconds in between. at one point when it stopped the blue aura went away and then returned, it seemed to be a perfectly round sphere type object. after the object went north to south it stopped for another few seconds and then dropped strait down to the ground out of sight into the tree's. it appeared to have landed on the far side of highway 9 maybe about where the end of cooper street ends or at-least somewhere in that general area. there seemed to be a helicopter to the north of where this strange object went down and the helicopter was no more then 500ft above ground, it could have been a small plane as well, did not have a lot of time to look at it because it went out of sight and i heard no noise from either of the objects. there is a possibility that it could have been a rc helicopter with a weird light attached to it, but it sure did not seem like one. was definitely not a plane, real helicopter or anything i am used to seeing and it did seem to be intelligently controlled. if anyone else saw this or knows what this was please post what you know or saw, i would like to know what this was. one other wierd thing is that i seemed to forget about this event until later the same night when something that reminded me about it triggered the memory, could have just been me forgetting about it i dunno.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White/yellowish interior glow with a blue aura arount it, after a few left to rights it decended to the ground

content.detailedDescription: I saw a huge triangle hovering above the cosgrove bridge on the ashley river.  i was driving south on i-26 and toke the cosgrove exit. i could see it over the bridge while i was exiting.  it flew slowly over the bridge and i almost drove under it as it passed over the bridge.  i could have thrown a rock at it, it was so close and low.  for sure other drivers had to have seen it.  a huge black triangle with white lights on each corner and a couple red blinking lights. it was traveling point forward (triangle).  i was so excited i just wanted to cross the bridge fast so i could pull over and see it.  it was behind me at this point.  by the time i crossed the bridge and pulled over, it was far away, flying low and going out of site because it was flying below the tree line from my perspective.  i could see the back of it. it was traveling away from me, north, northeast.  it had a red light/glow in the center on the tail which seemed to be the propulsion.  it seemed to flicker. i called a friend that lived in the direction it was flying to tell him to look outside for it and then another smaller triangle came across the river so i hung up and i recorded it on my phone.  it was traveling west to east. this one was smaller but looked the same.  both had the red glow on the back.  the smaller one looked kinda like a stealth bomber flying really slow.  it flew faster than the first triangle. you can see the red glow on the back and you see it flicker out near the end of the video.  my feelings were of excitement but then later frustration because i didn't get the bigger triangle on video.  i wish i would have put my hazard lights on and just stopped on the bridge to video record it.  it would have been better footage that what i got.
content.summary: I saw 2 black triangles as i was driving.  i recorded one on my phone.

content.detailedDescription:
Approx. 7:45 pm 12/4/2013 came out of my prunedale home, located on a ridge at 630 ft. elevation, onto driveway and observed a bright circular-shaped orange light.  it was the brightest object in the sky, far brighter than any star or aircraft, excluding landing lights which are always brilliant white.  it was approx. 10 degrees above the horizon (ocean) at approx. 240 degrees from observation location.  sky was clear and cloudless and city lights from pacific grove and santa cruz both easily seen (30~40 miles).

observed light for 5 minutes through 9x63 vixen binoculars.  light appeared to be much larger and brighter than saturn/venus.  no detail was observed. light remained stationary vertically and horizontally when compared to intervening hillside-reference, as seen through binoculars.  

light turned off after 5 min. observation but did not turn off all at once.  upper half of circular shaped light turned off but bottom half remained on for additional one second and turned red before it turned off completely.  do not know how long light was there before initially observing it. waited for 5 min. before returning inside house and checked outside every 20 minutes for an hour afterwards to see if it had returned, but did not see it again.
content.summary: Saw 2xsaturn-sized rorange circular light for 5 min, became 1/2 circle red

content.detailedDescription: This occurred years ago, i'm doing this so there is some sort of a record of my sighting. i was riding my bike down a road with fairly heavy traffic in the charleston area. while riding i passed a clearing that's been cut out for power lines. i saw what looked like a large reflective globe the was in or next to the power lines. the object was motionless and the material resembled polished stainless steel. my first instinct was that this was a fixture installed by the power company. the sheer size of the object made me doubt that first instinct. i put my breaks on to get a better look, as soon as i looked down to put my kickstand down and looked back up it was gone.  no noise was heard.  this happened over 5 years ago and i've never forgotten the incident.
content.summary: Large spherical object that seemed to be touching power lines.

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting with relatives on thanksgiving day.What we saw was definitely not any plane, jet or helicopter or any man made ship that any of us had ever seen.See prior report for details. i am sending video attachment of what we saw now. i did not have it when i filed the original report.
content.summary: I have filed a report and need to add video i just received

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting with relatives on thanksgiving day.What we saw was definitely not any plane, jet or helicopter or any man made ship that any of us had ever seen.See prior report for details. i am sending video attachment of what we saw now. i did not have it when i filed the original report.
content.summary: I have filed a report and need to add video i just received

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my backyard off and on for most of the night of august 31st and well into the morning of september 1st. it was early morning september 1st of this year 2013 that i became a ufo believer. i say a ufo believer but i want to make it clear that i did not see an alien creature or little green men but that i did see a ufo up close and it was not from this world. that i do know at 54 years old and a star gazer my whole life like most other people that dream about what may be up there among the stars. i told my wife and all of my many friends about my ufo encounter for a couple of weeks or more until i decided to shut up. i was very disappointed that none of my friends or relatives or even my wife seemed to believe me. but really how could they believe me. they all thought that i had lost it. but my wife and all my friends know i do not shoot bull and i can not lie just like pinnoccio and they all know and respect that. it made everything a little frustrating for me. i have a small video that i managed to get while running down my street with my camera above my head trying to find the object in my screen. it was 3 o'clock in the morning and i was still quite shocked at what i had just witnessed prior to my bad idea of getting the camera. there are some cool pictures of the video frames blown up and the picture are a little frightening. when the ufo came straight at me from the north sky it looked like an orange circle or orange light bulb. i thought it may be some kind of science project from macmaster university or something like that or maybe some kind of hoax. it was certainly odd because at the time i noticed it, there was nothing but clouds in the sky and no stars to be seen. i continued to glare at this bright orange light that was getting larger and larger and seemed to be dropping from the sky as well as moving toward me very quickly. it maintained its large orange circle appearance until it stopped above the house across the street from me. at that point i could not see anything (including my house that i was standing right beside) but purple plasma that was firing out rapidly from the complete surface of the outer rim of the large orange circular glow that looked like the moon in front of me. it was breath-taking and i knew at that moment that i was actually seeing a ufo and not a hoax. there were many recent siting that i located on google after my sighting and i read many reports but i never read of anyone talking about the purple plasma and i believe it never got close enough to the other ufo sighters to see the plasma. i also believe the plasma is what disrupts any signal it may give off to detect its presence in the sky. the plasma was electric and moving frantically. it may have been scanning me or something like that as it sat above the house across the street for more than a few seconds. i wasn't sure what to do at that moment. when i finally moved my feet to run and get my camera in the house, the ufo seemed to rotate or shift and then began to move straight west. i ran as fast as i could in through the back door and out the front door with my camera in my hand. i was running down the street and looking down at the camera to make sure i had it set to video because it was too far for a picture or flash shot. i am a camera picture taking fanatic and my camera is usually at my side or always close. what a mistake that was getting the camera. i should have run out to the front of my house and forget about the camera to continue watching because i missed a few seconds that i could have viewed and because the footage is much like other footage i had viewed on google. the video footage shows the orange glow moving away from me higher up and a lot farther away. there is a small sparkle that appears very close to it at all times. i have what may be a picture of the sparkle up close. the sparkle object reflects different colored lights much like the flashing lights on the bottom of an airplane. it also seemed to me that the sparkle may be the large orange ufo's guidence system ... gps. i researched as much as i could the next day and many days after for any other sightings at the same time as the siting i had seen. when i came out the front door that night to see where it was located in the sky, and where to point my camera, i could almost see a structure behind the circular orange glow as it traveled away from me and was getting smaller in size. it almost looked like a robot type shape behind the big orange glow as i believe i was viewing the backside of the object. the visual overpowering front side may be a smokescreen or cammileon of some sort, hiding the structure that is behind the orange circular glow. with the endless shooting purple plasma surrounding the orange circular face when it was right in front of me, makes me believe it knew i was there. i am a weather guy of sorts and watch the weather channel often as it relates to the clouds and sky activity. i say that because i am located in a unique area of our city for sky activity. i am located at the foot of a small mountain behind me and a valley beside me. i am located right beside hydro wires and towers as well as an airport up on the hill behind me and straight above me are at least 3 major wind roadways that are always there and that produce some of the most beautiful sunset skies and cloud formations on the planet when the 3 winds meet in the sky. when i researched for other ufo sighting, i discovered that the main criteria for many sightings are airports and hydro towers and lines. i have looked up in the sky repeatedly every night since and i am starring up more than ever. my fear now is that i will see it again and that may be it for me. i have some questions of my own regarding the whole experience. i wonder if it is possible that i may have received some radiation from the closeness of the craft and perhaps it is detectable on my body or in my blood. i know that i was a little tired for a while there with no real explanation. for those who have had a close experience there is the question of will it come back and take me. are there more and what are they doing. is there an eminent attack from another race being planned. why can't people get better proof of these objects or aliens. i have wanted to write down my sighting for a long time now and i am glad that it is done. i know it must be frustrating for other fellow ufo sighters to get anyone to believe you and i hope my experience helps to ease the frustration a little. i believe you. i really do. i have added the short video that i was able to capture and some of the frames of the video blown up. i believe now that there must be plenty of evidence out there of ufo activities but the government does not know how to explain it all to us the people. keep watching the skies and take care.
content.summary: Cloudy night with no stars. one large orange star that dropped from the sky like a jelly fish in water right in front of me. stunning to say the least..

content.detailedDescription: Was outside talking to neighbor when this reddish orange orb lewd directly overhead with no noise x3 top level was not traveling at a high rate of speed yes they did north and i ran into the street screaming ufo ufo and whistling real wild several neighbors came out to see what i was whistling about several neighbors saw what i saw. flew out of sight
content.summary: Red and orange orb flew directly overhead coming out of the gulf of mexico headed north.

content.detailedDescription:
on dec. 3, 2013 at 5:41 pm est i was aware there was going to be a satellite launch from florida cape canaveral. as many times before i knew if the sky was right i could see it from tampa. i watched as the satellite was launched. i took pictures. when i looked at them online i found a big surprise. directly above the launch is ufo lights. i did not notice the objects with my naked eye. i was looking at the entire area at the time of the launch. after the two boosters broke away was when this picture was taken.I took several pictures and only three had the objects in them.
i have done a lot or research on ufo's (ufo my lying eye's - author) and know that it has been reported that they have been seen at launch times. never before did i see one at this time. i have witnessed two other sighting but it was in 1968 at close range and one in 1981.
what amazes me is the reaction of people when you try to tell them you have seen something so amazing and they blow it off.
content.summary: 5-6 ufo's directly above satellite launch- florida

content.detailedDescription: Columbus ohio, monday, december 2, 2013 at 5:48 a.M. driving to work on 5th avenue, just as i came off of woodland ave and was driving east on 5th avenue i observed a light formation that was very bright and unusual in the sky on my left that was low in the horizon, just above the trees. unsure what object was i had no speculations.   i was able to see object clearly as i approached harvey court on the 2000 block, it was hovering above an apartment complex on the north side of 5th ave.  cube or box like object approximately 120 feet above the apartment building and covered approximately a 4000 square feet area.  the best way for me to describe this object is to picture a square box and then divide it into 4 lateral parts, take the top 1/4 of the box and that would be the shape of the object.  this object was stationary as i approached it, i was moving east.  it started moving west just after i passed it.  it had 3 huge round white lights on one side and smaller round red lights on the underside corners.  the 3 white lights were facing  west and i could only see 3 red lights due to the angle of the object.  the red lights were steady and did not flash or change color.  it was dark and it was cloudy and overcast that morning so the sky was a solid whitish color which acted as a backdrop for the object which allowed me to see the shape and size of said object.  the object had no color, it was like looking at a black void. i have never seen anything like it, so i find it hard to describe.  it made no sound as i passed it, the object was stationary.  i looked forward for traffic, looked back over left shoulder and it had begun moving slowly west bound parallel with 5th ave. still no sound being made by this object. traffic is very light at that time in the morning i debated trying to get to my cell phone for a picture but decided i would probably miss something digging for the phone.    looked forward for traffic and looked back again, at this point 5th avenue  is downhill.  i was unable to see anything else due to trees around building and slope of street.   i got to the red light at sunbury which is the bottom of the hill, look around in my mirrors but didn't see anything else.  i was unusually calm during the whole event and i am still trying to process what i have seen.
content.summary: Observed dark square object about 15 feet tall with white and red lights that hovered silently above a two story apartment.

content.detailedDescription: Having a camp fire in are back yard an then a bunch orbs and they would warp to another place and move very fast.
content.summary: Mixed emotions happy anxiety scared

content.detailedDescription: it started in pittsburgh pa, nj,ok,and aurora co.
content.summary: From 1953 to 2011

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home during lunch break and i seen a small and short plume of smoke way up in the sky. high elevation. looked like a meteor. the time was 12:30pm, clear and sunny. no other clouds in the sky except the falling plume of smoke. i then seen an object falling which reflected in the sun. immediately the object stopped and flew straight across in another direction. the smoke instantly disappeared. not like a jet's emission but more like atmospheric smoke from a fireball! it was gone! the object that was flying left a small ice? trail behind and in a blink the entire object was gone. 
a few minutes later there were a couple jets (high altitude) flying in the general area. 

i have not heard any news reports as of yet. anyone else see this?
content.summary: Fireball clouds that dissapeared revealing fast moving object that changed directions

content.detailedDescription:
Above glasgow today i saw a fireball object falling straight down from the sky - it appeared to hover  then change direction as it went easterly. 
it was large and was tear drop shaped- a plane appeared in the close vicinity and the plane appeared small in comparison to the fireball like object 
i saw this as i was driving toward the st james roundabout paisley at 8.10 this morning 
i lost sight as i had to drive in the opposite direction. 
it was very strange and eerie
content.summary: Fireball like object falling from sky

content.detailedDescription:
Hello mr.Munns, i am dropping you an email as i saw something on sunday night i can't explain. i am ex military and a bit of an aviation enthusiast so am quite familiar with most of the aircraft in our skies. 
on sunday evening my girlfriend and i were travelling home from my sisters in stirling, along the m9 southbound en route to glasgow. at the same time my girlfriend and i became aware of a large gold light above the gargunnock hills. living under the flight path to glasgow airport i am familiar with aircraft landing lights and am fairly positve they are seldom gold and don't remain in the same location. or shine with the intensity these light were shining with. we watched these lights for 30 seconds, then from left to right, anti clock wise they blinked out. one after an other. we could see the silhouette of the hills below so can be sure they weren't from the ground. whilst illuminated the lights were in an almost disc configuration although quite flat at the bottom and were angled up, at what appeared to be almost 45 degrees to the ground. the gold light seemed to twinkle, as if there was more than one and they were shinning in succession before blinking out over a 5 second period. very strange. 
anyway, felt compelled to report it as i have never seen anything like it. i spend a lot of time looking at the planets both through a telescope and without, it was way too early for venus. the sighting occured around 19.30pm.
content.summary: Bright gold/white shimmering lights. large object above hills. lights blinked out anti clockwise

content.detailedDescription: It was 8 pm, i was in my car driving down a usually busy city street that's in between two major intersections.  but at this time, it was late on a sunday evening.  my husband was following directly behind me in his car.  there were few cars on the street along with us at this time.  this short stretch of neighborhood area has few street lights.  an object caught my eye on the right side of the street.  at first, i thought it was a street light.  then i noticed that it was a bright/glowing red orange object that was gliding at tree level.  it crossed our path.  i got to witness it up close as it crossed right in front of me.  the only way i can describe it, is that looking out my windshield from inside, it was about the size of a large car.  the object was glowing red from within and had a bright colorful haze around it.  it seemed to be in the shape of a tear drop sphere but it was so bright.  i would've gotten a good recording if i had had my phone out.  i slowed down and rolled my window down so that i could point out the object to my husband. it made no sound as it glided straight across.  i pulled over to the first parking lot i found and i was able to watch it until it disappeared.  this definitely is a populated area that i witnessed it in.  it was coming from an area that is somewhat isolated (south) but going towards the highly populated area (north).  it was not a fireball with a tail and it was not falling from the sky.  it was gliding across the sky at a low level and moderate speed.  i only saw one object but i kept looking around to see if i could see anything else.  when i got home, my husband confirmed that he too had seen the object.  i believe people when they say they witnessed things but i never thought i would see one on my own.
content.summary: Bright red orange sphere in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: Inside pool looked up, not too cloudy.Saw tear drop looking thing with pointy tip.Only shadow was visible flying through cloud.
content.summary: Looks like tear drop with pointy tip.Compact shape flying through cloud.Only shadow visible
